availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles W. Anderson (Union County, KY, physician)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Brown Anderson in Spencer County on June 22, 1846. Father of Emma Anderson, William B. Anderson, Mary E. Anderson, Charles Anderson, Joseph Anderson, and Ann L. Anderson. Physician in Spencer County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Spencer County in 1850. Physician in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District No. 1, p. 95A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District No. 1, p. 8 of 9 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com)
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 330.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Spencer County Marriages, Film #000482639, p. 156 of 439 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
